column5: I recently helped Duane (forgop on the board) plan and book his fly in trip this summer. Quite unexpectedly I received a package from him in the mail consisting of a bunch of very fine cigars and a couple of big bags of some really spectacular coffee beans. Two of my most favorite things.You're a true gentleman Duane, thank you!!
Mike, I thought he is a stand up guy! He invited me to join his group, I would have, if I hadnt planned my Red Lake trip for August. Its good to know that WC has such good people! Enjoy!
I'm sure you'll love Red Lake! And yes I agree it's a great bunch of guys on this site!
This is my second trip to Red Lake, this trip is all WC guys from Share a Seat! Looking forward to wetting a line with some new guys that love to fish!
Surprised they could read the address since he is half in the bag drunk on beer all the time. Dude starts early!!!! LOL Couldn't resist!!!!!
Those are the best kind of "Thank you's"....very thoughtful indeed!

Just a token of my appreciation for the help. Without your excellent reviews, I would have never stumbled across many of these lakes and your tips are great. However, it is your fault that I had to explain to my wife that I was going on another trip this summer after I planned to take the year off...but your pics/vids gave me walleye fever so I couldn't turn it down. Only 56 more days until Cancun, but 123 LONG days until Canada fishing.
